description: Nanjou Kisara, or Valkyrie, was the most recent member of Ragnarok to be made a Fist. Suspected of being a spy for the Shinpaku Alliance, she is attacked by the Valkyries, Freya`s female subordinates. Ken`ichi and Shigure come to her aid, and she resigns from Ragnarok. Siegfried later convinces her to join the Alliance. Kisara participates in the D of D tournament with the Alliance.
name: Nanjou Kisara
